sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { followUser } from '../../actions/userAction' const User = ({person}) => { const serverPublic = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const dispatch = useDispatch() const {user} = useSelector const handleFollow = ()=>{ dispatch(followUser()) } return (
{person.firstName} {person.username}
) } export default User
